title: Jinx no voice
body: I have played 3 games with Jinx and all 3 times her voice was not there. I have played other characters and I can hear them fine, but with Jinx I can not. I can hear her attack animations, recall and everything but her laugh and talking. I miss her crazy voice :) Please fix soon.

replies.body: I also have this issue, thought it was just me.

Hey SasukeMadara,

Thank you for the report! ^-^ We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
Mafia Jinx, right? They are aware and are working on it :3
